participant_1.background:
I wore my favorite color sneakers to Comic Con and had a great time!
After a long day at work, my favorite way to unwind is to watch anime and superhero shows.
i start an internship in engineering later this year.
I and my mom like to listen to the Beatles together.
i spend my evening creating the perfect music playlist.

participant_2.background:
I've kept my college debt a secret from my parents.
My family is important to me, and I like to share stories about them with my children.
i work over 60 hours a week as a restaurant manager.
School is going well, but I'm looking forward to spending more time on my hobbies.
i work as a bartender.

content.text: Hello, hope you are having a great day!
Thanks, I am! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you. I am looking forward to my internship in engineering this year.
That sounds like a great opportunity, congratulations! What kind of engineering will you be working on?
I am not sure yet, but I am excited to learn more. I am interested in mechanical engineering, but I am open to other fields.
I see, that is great. I work as a restaurant manager, so I do not have much experience with engineering.
That is a lot of hours! What do you like most about your job?
I enjoy working with people, and I like making sure that our customers have a positive experience.
That makes sense. I am sure you are a great manager!
Thanks, I try my best. What do you do for fun?
I like to watch anime and superhero shows. I also like listening to music and spending time with my family.
That sounds like a great way to relax. I like to spend time with my family too, and I like to play video games.
Oh, I love video games! What are some of your favorites?
I like playing action games and role-playing games. I also like playing multiplayer games with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I mostly play single-player games.
I see, there are a lot of great single-player games out there too
